# HTML Mixed with Citations

HTML link and citation: <a href="https://example.com">link</a> [1]

Citation in HTML: <div>This is a div with [2] inside</div>

HTML comment with citation: <!-- This is a comment [3] -->

Citation in HTML attribute: <span title="Reference [4]">text</span>

Complex HTML structure [5]:

<div class="container">
  <p>Paragraph with [5] citation</p>
  <ul>
    <li>List item [6]</li>
    <li>Another item [7]</li>
  </ul>
</div>

HTML entities [9]: &lt;tag&gt; &amp; &quot;quoted&quot;

Citation in script tag: <script>var x = [8];</script>

Citation in style tag: <style>.class { margin: [9]px; }</style>

Mixed inline HTML <strong>[10]</strong> and <em>[11]</em>.
<!-- mdcitefix:refs -->
[1]: https://one.example.com
[2]: https://two.example.com
[3]: https://three.example.com
[4]: https://four.example.com
[5]: https://six.example.com
[6]: https://seven.example.com
[7]: https://eight.example.com
[8]: https://ten.example.com
[9]: https://eleven.example.com
[10]: https://twelve.example.com
[11]: https://thirteen.example.com
